answers.answer: My son was behind on growth,  I was 33 weeks and he was only weighing a pound and a half. My doc have me a week to eat and see if he would grow any. That week I ate high in protein things, but still healthy, six times a day. He gained a pound and ad half within that week. Eat as much healthy high in protein things you can, I hope for the best! I got to keep him in until his due date and he was ad healthy 6 pound 9 ounces!  Try not to stress, only will cause your body to react negatively and lose weight, meaning no weight gain for that baby

We are being induced early, tomorrow actually.My baby has been small the whole pregnancy (under the 10th percentile) and I am also high risk with diabetes and hypertension.  So I think they really want to control my labor to be able to closely monitor both of us.

question: So I go next week to find out if there gonna take my baby early because he is behind on growth. I'll be 34 weeks when I go. Has anyone had their baby taken because they was behind on growth a little bit? If so when did they take him/Her?
title: anybody??
